issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: RBF: The DN_REPORT_TIME_OUT and DN_REPORT_CACHE_EXPIRE should be configured in RBFConfigKeys.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Surefire manifest jar classloading broken on latest Debian/Ubuntu Java8

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Recently all the unit tests are failing. This is caused by the latest Java 8 issue reported at SUREFIRE-1588 and fixed in Maven Surefire plugin 3.0.0-M1. We need to update the plugin.

This message was automatically generated.
I could reproduce the following test failures in Docker environment (via start-build-env.sh), and the configuration fixed the error.
Rethinking this, it's better to upgrade maven surefire plugin to 3.0.0-M1 instead of workaround SUREFIRE-1588. I'll update the title of this issue and upload a patch shortly.

+1, thanks for fixing this [~ajisakaa]. Feel free to commit this as you know which branch it needs to land.

Thanks.

Thanks [~cheersyang] for reviewing this. Committed this to trunk, branch-3.2, branch-3.1, and branch-3.0.
I'll check if branch-2 and downstream branches are affected.
branch-2* are not affected because Java 7 is used for precommit test.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #15397 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/15397/])
HADOOP-15916. Upgrade Maven Surefire plugin to 3.0.0-M1. (aajisaka: rev a736b5da15084e8eb93d2f68f8eccc506ff7bea7)
* (edit) hadoop-project/pom.xml
